alert.note: Alert for Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 12:26PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT KEWEENAW COUNTY THROUGH 100 PM EDT... At 1225 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Mott Island Park Headquarters, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Mott Island Park Headquarters and Siskiwit Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
